competencies.text: Identify characteristics of a resilent organization or community.
Research multiple perspectives of a public issue.
Identify multiple perspectives of a public issue.
Demonstrate awareness of ethical issues embedded in public problems.

review_instructions: Please review your selected tasks. Click the print button to save your custom planner.

assignments.title: First Task
assignments.instructions: Burgdoggen ribeye picanha ham hock, pastrami strip steak shank shankle doner filet mignon pork. Jowl strip steak porchetta pastrami. Beef short ribs tenderloin turkey. Pancetta ham hock frankfurter pork pastrami.
